home.title: dev-roar-researcher
home.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer
home.intro: A full-stack engineer with 7 years of experience, specializing in scalable system design and cloud infrastructure with AWS and Python. Proficient across the entire technology stack from backend to frontend, I am passionate about building software that delivers real business value.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: As dev-roar-researcher, I have been working as a full-stack engineer for 7 years. I specialize in cloud infrastructure and backend development, focusing on designing and building scalable and reliable systems.

experience.title: Experience
experience.role: Full-stack engineer working across backend to frontend technologies
experience.focus: Cloud infrastructure design, development, and operations using AWS

cloud.title: Cloud & Infrastructure
cloud.items: AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, CloudFormation, etc.), Docker, Kubernetes

backend.title: Backend
backend.items: Python (Django, FastAPI, Flask), Node.js, REST API Design, Database Design

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For project inquiries or job opportunities, please feel free to reach out via GitHub or the blog comment section.
